item.description:
I volunteer weekly for the Rhode Island Family Literacy Initiative. It is is a free, first-step family literacy program for adults and their children based at public libraries throughout Rhode Island. RIFLI offers English as a Second Language (ESL), citizenship preparation and computer instruction as well as children's programming, student resource support and links to library resources and services.

Help support this cause by attending their 2nd annual fundraiser at the Hi-Hat in Providence. There will be live music, dancing and a penny social (aka Chinese raffle). It's a family friendly evening for all.

The Boston Latin Band will be performing, and there will be a salsa lesson.

To purchase tickets, call 401-455-8185. Adults $10 advanced ($15 at door). Kids are free. Free parking. Each person is responsible for obtaining their own ticket.

More Info: http://www.rifli.org/... and http://www.thehihat.c... and http://www.myspace.co...
item.name: 2nd Annual RIFLI Fundraiser
